relatedanime.anime: Lovely Movie: Itoshi no Muuco Season 2

anime.description: The anime depicts the life of the pet dog http://anidb.net/ch77189 [Muuco] and her owner http://anidb.net/ch77187 [Komatsu-san], who lives in his glass-making workshop in the mountains. Source: ANN

tag.name: seinen
tag.description: Seinen, literally "young man", is one of the main demographic classifications applied to manga, and, by extension, to anime, especially manga-based ones. As the name implies, seinen works are marketed primarily to an audience of young men; the age range commonly understood to be the target of such works goes roughly from 17 to somewhere in the 40s.

tag.name: target audience
tag.description: Anime, like everything else in the modern world, is targeted towards specific audiences, both implicitly by the creators and overtly by the marketing. While categories are associated with specific sex and age groups, this is not a bar on the anime being enjoyed by people who don`t fit into that band; not only do crossover titles exist, but the categories also have a considerable following outside their main demographic, and a person might as well enjoy anime from all categories. Still, does not invalidate the usefulness of marking a title as one of the categories; the same themes will likely be treated differently in anime geared for different audiences. Only one should not jump the gun and assume that a title will be more or less serious or present content in this or that way due to its target audience, or conversely assume the target audience on the content and its presentation alone. As such, the audience categories help form a broad impression of how a title might work with the announced themes, but offer little to no in-depth information about specific content or its treatment. The audience categories originate from manga magazines, which group titles of a same intended audience into a magazine that is advertised as belonging to that category, and so manga-based anime will have the category from their parent work. As for anime based on other works, the audience is often debatable, but comparing information such as time slot to the manga-based anime generally helps figure out the most likely possibility. If the parent material was classified under multiple audiences over time (for example, it was originally shounen, but then as the plot changed and became more mature, it was reclassified as seinen), and the anime adapts parent material time periods covering multiple audiences, we tag all audiences covered by the anime adaptation.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: manga
tag.description: Manga is the lifeblood that drives the anime industry. Everything and its mother is based on manga. However! There are exceptions where the manga was not the basis for the anime. It`s common practice to make manga adaptations of many popular anime, there`s a manga based on Evangelion, and two (one shounen and one shoujo) based on each of Escaflowne and Mahou Tsukai Tai. Also it`s quite common to release manga and anime versions of a story in parallel, for instance Nadesico and Shoujo Kakumei Utena. There are also cases where an anime continues in a manga, as in the case of Angel Beats! and Angel Beats: Heaven`s Door, or reverse. See also http://anidb.net/t6493 [manhua] and http://anidb.net/t5010 [manhwa].

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: half-length episodes
tag.description: Half-length episodes are regular episodes that are somewhat shorter than the standard length. This includes episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length; shows with episodes up to and including 10 minutes are http://anidb.net/t5852 [short episodes] instead.

episode.title: 待て!
Wait!
Mate!
episode.summary: Hello, this is Muco speaking! Delicious-looking jerky appears right before Muco`s eyes! But Muco isn`t allowed to eat it. That`s because Komatsu-san said, "Wait." Muco will wait as long as Komatsu-san says so! But... But... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: お客さんがやってきた! ムーコは嫉妬でおなかぐるぐる
We Have a Customer! Muco`s Tummy Growls with Jealousy
Okyakusan ga Yattekita! Muuco wa Shitto de Onaka Guruguru
episode.summary: Hello, this is Muco! Komatsu-san made this thing called a "home page," but he still doesn`t have any customers. Poor Komatsu-san... But then, wait, we got a customer! Komatsu-san looks so happy! Huh? Now for some reason, Muco`s tummy is growling...? Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 車でお出かけ! ムーコ, 風になる
Let`s Go for a Car Ride! Muco Becomes the Wind
Kuruma de Odekake! Muuco, Kaze ni Naru
episode.summary: Hello, it`s Muco! This time, Muco goes shopping with Komatsu-san in his car! Muco loves cars! The breeze feels so good. But these bad guys appear on the way. Komatsu-san and Muco are in danger?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おはなつやつやムーコはこまつさんが大好き!
Shiny-Nosed Muco Loves Komatsu-san!
Ohana Tsuyatsuya Muuco wa Komatsu-san ga Daisuki!
episode.summary: Nice to meet you, it`s Muco! I live with my beloved Komatsu-san! Komatsu-san makes this sparkly thing called "glass." But Muco`s nose is even shinier and more sparkly! Hmhmhm! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 棒
Stick
Bou
episode.summary: Hello! Muco here! You can chew on it! You can throw it! Do you want to know the identity of Muco`s beloved? Hmhmhm! Watch to find out! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: この夏一番暑い日!
The Hottest Day of the Summer!
Kono Natsu Ichiban Atsui Hi!
episode.summary: Hi. Komatsu speaking. Did you know a kiln reaches temperatures between 1100 and 1300 degrees C? Which means summer is Hell! Especially when there`s a heatwave. I can`t stand it. Muco is drained. I`m irritated. This is the story of the hottest day in summer. Seriously. It`s hot... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 夏が来た! 台風, 花火, ひえぴったん
Summer Is Here! Typhoons, Fireworks, and Cold Packs
Natsu ga Kita! Taifuu, Hanabi, Hiepittan
episode.summary: Hi. Komatsu speaking. I`m doing the preview for episode 6 this time and we`re in the full swing of summer. What with typhoons and such, Muco is causing a big fuss. But one thing strikes me... buying two of those particular items is very Ushikou-ish. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: おさんぽだいすき! 今日はいつもと違う道
I Love Walks! Today, We Take a Different Path
Osanpo Daisuki! Kyou wa Itsumo to Chigau Michi
episode.summary: Hello! Muco here! Muco loves going on walks! Why does Muco love walks? Because she gets to go to many different places with Komatsu-san! Muco will go anywhere, as long as Komatsu-san is with her! Wait... Where are we...? No!!! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雪にまつわるエトセトラ
All About the Snow, Etc.
Yuki ni Matsuwaru et Cetera
episode.summary: Hmhmhm, it`s Muco! At last, snow has fallen from the sky! Muco loves the snow! She can go slide-slide-slide-slide in it, and she can eat it and make mysterious things happen! But know what Muco loves most of all? Komatsu-san! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うしこう, 留守を頼む
Ushicou, Keep an Eye on the Shop
Ushikou, Rusu o Tanomu
episode.summary: How are you all doing? This is Muco speaking! Today, Komatsu-san went out so Ushikou-san and I are "holding the fort." You can count on "Ironwoman Muco" to keep the peace at the workshop! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 玲奈のガラス体験記
Rena`s Glass Blowing Experience
Rena no Glass Taikenki
episode.summary: Komatsu meets a bartender. Muco meets the bartender`s daughter, Rena. Still a little wary over their last encounter, Muco begrudgingly puts up with her. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: うしこい.
Ushikoi.
Ushikoi.
episode.summary: Hello, Ushiko here. Ushikoi... Ushikoi has a nice ring to it. It really sounds great. Ushikoi, Ushikoi! I really am a hopeless romantic... wait, listen to me, damn it! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 篠原さんとクリスマスデート!
Christmas Date with Shinohara-san!
Shinohara-san to Christmas Date!
episode.summary: Ushikou speaking! At last, the day has arrived! Your sexy macaroon, aka, Kohei Ushijima, is facing his biggest challenge yet! Muco has a lot to learn about mature love. I`ll show her what a true romantic night is! Shinohara-san! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雪解けの季節
The Thaw
Yukidoke no Kisetsu
episode.summary: Hello! This is Muco! Looks like all that snow is gradually melting away. Do you know why it does that? Muco knows why. Muco sees right through everything! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 除雪車は憂鬱を運んでくる
The Snowplow Brings Misery
Josetsusha wa Yuuutsu o Hakonde Kuru
episode.summary: Hello, Komatsu speaking. Have you ever seen a snow plow? They`re very reliable machines who move snow around. To those of us who live in snowy places, they are super heroes. Do you realize why they`re so cool, Muco? I`ll bet what you don`t realize is there is a sluggish season soon to follow. (Cry.) Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 初日の出
First Sunrise
Hatsuhi no De
episode.summary: Muco doesn`t quite understand what this "new years" thing is, but it`s here! Muco loves playing in the snow!... But wait! The newly transformed Ushikou-san has launched an attack on Muco! Please! Help! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: こまつさん, 朝顔が咲いてますよ!
Komatsu-san, the Morning Glories Are Blooming!
Komatsu-san, Asagao ga Saitemasu yo!
episode.summary: Good morning! Muco speaking. Muco loves summer! There`s this flower that blooms in summer mornings, and it looks just like Muco. Look, Komatsu-san, look! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ムーコのぐるぐるが止まらない!
Muco Won`t Stop Growling!
Muuco no Guruguru ga Tomaranai!
episode.summary: Hello everyone. Shinohara here. Today is the day I finally take up Komatsu-san on his offer to teach me glass blowing. I`m a little nervous about it since I`ve never done this before, but I`ll give it my all! Muco-chan, be sure to cheer for me, too. Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 負けられない戦い
A Fight I Can`t Afford to Lose
Makerarenai Tatakai
episode.summary: Hello. Bouda speaking. Komatsu-kun and I fight in this episode. I don`t really like fighting, but sometimes a man`s got to fight. I`m pretty sure I`ll win, but be sure to tune in and find out! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 芸の道はイバラの道!?
The Path to Mastery Is Lined with Thorns!?
Gei no Michi wa Ibara no Michi!?
episode.summary: Hi. Komatsu speaking. Ushikou always brings Muco lots of toys and it`s a big help, but Muco doesn`t seem to like them much. Ushikou`s got crappy taste! Huh? What? He says he has an ace in the hole today?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: たまき君登場! うしこう涙の理由
Enter Tamaki-kun! Why Ushicou Cried
Tamaki-kun Toujou! Ushikou Namida no Riyuu
episode.summary: Hi, everyone. I`m Tamaki! I fell in love with Komatsu-san`s glass studio and came to work here part time. I`m going to train really hard under Komatsu-san so I can blow glass just like him someday. I hope you all support me... Oh, crap! Why is there something I don`t do well around in the studio?! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 覚醒! 池に入ってもバレないチカラ
Powers Awaken! The Ability to Enter the Pond Unnoticed
Kakusei! Ike ni Haitte mo Barenai Chikara
episode.summary: Hello! Muco speaking. In this episode, Muco finally obtains an awesome power! If she uses this power, she can play in the pond without Komatsu-san getting angry! This is the birth of Muco the Invincible! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 運命の出会い. うしこうとこまつとサラダボウル
A Fated Encounter: Ushicou, Komatsu, and Salad Bowl
Unmei no Deai. Ushikou to Komatsu to Salad Bowl
episode.summary: There was a reason why Komatsu became a glass blower - rumor has it, some hot guy inspired him. I`ll bet you wanna know who that is. Huh? You don`t? Come on, work with me, people! (sob...) Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 花火だいすき!
I Love Fireworks!
Hanabi Daisuki!
episode.summary: Hi! Rena here! We`re gonna play with fireworks at Komatsu-san`s workshop. There are many different kinds of fireworks and Rena likes them all! Ushikou-san is gonna buy them for us. I wonder what kind he`ll get? I`m sure they`ll be wonderful......probably! Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: ムーコとコマツオトメ
Muco and Komatsu-otome
Muuco to Komatsu Otome
episode.summary: It`s springtime. Cherry trees are blooming, and someone has a date...? Source: crunchyroll
